meaningMnemonic: Each <radical>tree</radical> needs its <radical>drum</radical> <radical>measurement</radical> done before you can say it's really made of <kanji>wood</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: If you're still not sure if the tree is really made of <kanji>wood</kanji>, just take out a small <reading>ju</reading>ice (じゅ) box and start drinking it. A wooden tree will show no interest in the juice box at all.
